channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Middle States Accreditation Community Open Forum Event Scheduled for August 27
item.description: From 2:00PM to 3:00PM on Tuesday, August 27, the Middle States Committee will be hosting an open forum to present the findings of the Middle States Self-Study draft and obtain additional feedback. The in-person event will take place in the CBIS Isermann Auditorium; participants can also choose to attend the forum remotely via Webex.
item.author: Community

item.title: “Center of Gravity” Series to Conclude August 14
item.description: Date: Wednesday, August 14, 2024 4:00 PM - 10:00 PM - This is your last chance this summer to visit the Center of Gravity, your one-stop for personal, academic and well-being success! Activities include novelty food and snacks, academic support from peer tutors and course TAs, away semester searches with the CCPD, wellness and well-being activities, water coloring, Legos, book clubs and more, so be sure to stop by!
item.author: Community

item.title: DotCIO Tech Tip Tuesday: AutoRecover Available with Some Windows/Mac Office 365 Apps
item.description: Oh, no! You forgot to save the document you were working on, or there was an unplanned disruption that caused your computer to shut down unexpectedly! What can you do? Luckily, some Office 365 applications for Windows and Mac have an AutoRecover feature that attempts to recover files automatically in case of an unplanned interruption.
item.author: Community

item.title: Information Session for 2025 Project RFP: Quantum Computing Track 4 to be Held August 16
item.description: From 1:00PM to 3:00PM on Friday, August 16, RPI and IBM representatives will discuss details of the Track 4 RFP and answer questions regarding the scope and process for this call. Registration is required to participate; please contact Kathy Fontaine if you have questions.
item.author: Community

item.title: MBA for Professionals Review to be Held August 14
item.description: Date: Wednesday, August 14, 2024 7:00 PM - 7:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph. D., as he reviews this innovative project-based, online MBA for professionals program. Participants will learn to lead from every aspect of an organization with real-world MBA experience, prepare to lead the most dynamic and innovative organizations, and engage, involve, motivate, and lead others to reach their fullest potential….
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Faculty/Staff Webinar to Discuss Ways to Handle Student Absences
item.description: Date: Tuesday, August 20, 2024 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM - In this Quick Learn workshop, Maureen Fodera of the Office of Undergraduate Education will offer some of the best practice strategies faculty can use for dealing with student absences. Please register if you plan to attend.

item.title: An Important Notice to All Instructors Regarding LMS Fall 2024 Course Requests
item.description:
All Rensselaer Learning Management System (Blackboard Learn SaaS) instructors, designers, and TAs who are planning on having an LMS course site for the Fall 2024 term should note that “Do submit” and “Do not submit” conditionals are still in place for submitting their course requests.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
